li.p: Operating ambient temperature range: 0⁰C to 40⁰C (32⁰F to 104⁰F).
Relative humidity range from 0% to 95% non-condensing.
Altitude: Standard: 3000 ft. Maximum altitude 10,000 ft. For altitudes above 10,000 ft contact Eaton PDI.

body.p: Transformers generate heat, which should be considered in placing the PDU. BTUs for standard transformers offered at 100, 150, 225, 300, and 400 kVA are given in .
